page.title: 11Parish Magazine Extracts. 1
page.content: {June 1984.}A letter from one of the girls of{Havergal College,Toronto, } Canada whose choir visited Aberford in March 1984. Dear Mrs. Tait, Thanks very much for organizing Havergal's stay in Aberford and I speak for all of us when I say that the Aberford visit was the most enjoyable part of our British tour. We shall all remember the hospitality and kindness that was shown to us. Yours truly Suzann Gordon {July 1984. Gala Day Highlights.}1.15 judging of floats outside the village hall - 1.45 floats procession through the village -2.30 gala opened by Mr. Frank Watson -3.15 marching display by Selby Saints - 4.30 5-a-side football finals on the school playing fields. {October 1984. School Harvest Festival}
